Name: Q.U.I.R.K.™
About the game: Our Fall content update is now LIVE! Avatar customizations, New sportsball game type, TONS of new blocks, and SPOOKY PROPS! Welcome to Q.U.I.R.K. Q.U.I.R.K . is a game that PC and Mac gamers can play together, and it's compatible with the HTC Vive! Join coop matches against AI or go straight-up PVP! Directed by user feedback and fueled by user generated content, regular updates will give players more of the things they enjoy, and less of the things that suck. Currently, you can build and play multi-player death matches, capture the flag, sandbox, and sportsball games with an ever-expanding list of special weapons and in-game tools like: Jet Packs Bazookas Stun Guns Grappling Plunger A wide variety of blocks and special art assets with a host of colors and functions Prior to launch, future updates will allow you to build, share, and play new Q.U.I.R.K. game types like: King of the Hill Sports Ball Arena Tower Defense And the many, many game types that will be suggested by our community.
Meta Title: Q.U.I.R.K.™: Mar 29, 2017, uGen Inc. and Full Overview
